item.title: Neoadjuvant vs Adjuvant Immunotherapy in Colon Cancer
item.description: Experts debate which patients with stage III dMMR colon cancer will benefit from the two treatment approaches. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Ketamine’s Antidepressant Action May Depend on Opioid System
item.description: Results from a small study suggest ketamine’s antidepressant effects may require activation of the brain’s opioid system. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Oncology’s Side Effect Disconnect: The Messy Reality
item.description: Adverse events reported in oncology clinical trials don’t always match what patients experience. What is behind this disconnect and is it possible to ...

item.title: Breaking Barriers: How Inclusive Is Your Practice?
item.description: Many LGBTI+ patients withhold key details when they fear bias in primary care settings. Medscape Medical News
